sense.def:
To express reproach
pomeni nekomu omeniti, da smo žalostni in razočarani zaradi nečesa, kar je storil.

seg.quote: She was still staring at him in shocked and silent reproach.
She responded submissively to his reproaches.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To reproach someone
pomeni nekomu prizadeto povedati, da je naredil nekaj narobe.

seg.quote: He used to reproach her mother for not being nice enough to her.
He had bitterly reproached himself for his complacency.
